title: HAGERTY'S Aaron Robinson & KBB's Lyn Woodward
description:
Aaron Robinson is the Editor-at-Large of Hagerty Magazine, the beautiful bi-monthly publication available to Hagerty 'Drive Club' members. Lyn Woodward is a journalist and presenter for Kelley Blue Book. These two went to the 75th Anniversary of the Normandy invasion and brought home a Willys Jeep! We also talk about the "original" Safari cars, and Matt reviews the Amazon Prime movie "Framing John Delorean" 

This podcast is available as a video! Get it at: https://youtu.be/VfLg-MhJn-k

Follow us! @TheSmokingTire; @ZackKlapman
Follow Them! @AirRobinson; @Lyn__Woodward
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
